sourcesContent:
<template>
    <van-list
  v-model="loading"
  :finished="finished"
  finished-text="没有更多了"
  @load="onLoad"
>
  <van-cell v-for="item in list" :key="item" :title="item" />
</van-list>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name:"comment-list",
    data() {
    return {
      list: [],
      loading: false,
      finished: false,
    }
    },
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
